#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define sz(c) c.size()
#define x first
#define y second
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
const int SIZE = 1e4+1;
const ll mod = 1e9+7;
ll n,k;
int x,y;
int totWt;
ll *a;

inline ll scan()
{
    ll x=0;
    register char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9') c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return(x);
}

inline ll scanInt()
{
    ll noRead=0;
    char p=getchar_unlocked();
    for(;p<33;)
    {
        p=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    while(p>32)
    {
        noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
        p=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return noRead;
}




inline void write(ll x)
{
    int i=0;
    char s[25];
    do{
        s[i++]=x%10+'0';
        x/=10;
    }while(x);
    --i;
    while(i>=0) putchar_unlocked(s[i--]);
    putchar_unlocked('\n');
}


int main(int argc,char *argv[])
{
    ll tt=scanInt();
        while(tt--){
        n=scanInt();
        a=(ll *)malloc(n*sizeof(ll));
        ll mn=INT_MAX;
        ll tot=0LL;
        for(int i=0;i<n;++i){
            a[i]=scanInt();
            tot+=a[i];
            if(tot/(i+1)<mn) mn=tot/(i+1);}
        write(mn);
        free(a);}
       return 0;}
